overview:
Born in Germany, Rainer attended a public german grammar school near Frankfurt am Main until 2000, where he relocated to the international boarding school Schule Schloss Salem, close to the Lake of Constance, obtaining his International Baccalaureate in 2003.

Right after, he moved to Monaco to study at the International University of Monaco. In 2008 Rainer graduated as Bachelor of Arts in Business Management & eCommerce, and in 2009 as Master of Science in Luxury Goods & Services, specializing in luxury marketing and branding, and was awarded the “Outstanding Fellowship Award”.

While continuing to develop various personal web and social media projects, he as well specializes in brand identity consultancy (including website design and web presence, SEO, social media strategy, stationary design, user interfaces, presentation design, logo creation, etc) as well as photography.

degrees.degree_type: Master of Science in Luxury Goods & Services
